text:
Carla Calò, also known as Carrol Brown, (21 September 1926 – 29 December 2019) was an Italian actress. She was born in Palermo, Italy. Her best known roles were in "Totò Le Mokò", "Captain Falcon" and in "One Thousand Dollars on the Black".
Calò died on 29 December 2019 at the age of 93.

annotations.surface_form: One Thousand Dollars on the Black
